:py:mod:`pyslam.capture.Capture`
================================

.. py:module:: pyslam.capture.Capture


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   pyslam.capture.Capture.Capture




.. py:class:: Capture(uid: Optional[pyslam.UID])

   Bases: :py:obj:`abc.ABC`

   A generic base class that represents some kind of
   capture/measurement from a sensor.
